behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote_control(remote:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)  # Move close to the remote control
        achieve_once inhand(remote)  # Temporarily hold the remote control
        achieve close_char(char, tv)  # Move close to the TV
        achieve is_on(tv)  # Turn the TV on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        turn_on_tv_with_remote_control(remote, tv)

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
        achieve is_on(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        turn_on_tv(remote_control, tv)

behavior turn_on_tv(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        achieve close_char(char, television)
        touch(remote_control)
        achieve is_on(television)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        turn_on_tv(remote_control, television)

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(tv:item, remote:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote)
        # approach the remote control
        achieve_once inhand(remote)
        # pick up the remote control
        achieve facing_char(char, tv)
        # face the television
        achieve is_on(tv)
        # turn on the television

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        # select the television
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote)
        # select the remote control
        turn_on_tv_with_remote(tv, remote)
